Masque.from sentence: In this study , we propose Masque , a generative model for multi-passage RC .

pointer - generator mechanism.from sentence: We introduce the pointer - generator mechanism for generating an abstractive answer from the question and multiple passages , which covers various answer styles .

multi-style learning.from sentence: We introduce multi-style learning that enables our model to control answer styles and improves RC for all styles involved .

Transformer based one.from sentence: We extend the mechanism to a Transformer based one that allows words to be generated from a vocabulary and to be copied from the question and passages .

pointer - generator.from sentence: We also extend the pointer - generator to a conditional decoder by introducing an artificial token corresponding to each style , as in .
